alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Searcy and east central Newton Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Point Peter, or 15 miles east of Jasper, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marsena... Eula... Carver... Duff... Point Peter... St. Joe... Pindall... Gilbert... Yardelle... Silver Hill... Snowball... Woolum Recreation Area... Baker Ford... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
